description:
This #DecCraftKE panel focused on diversity and equal representation in the Kenyan tech scene. 

Moderator: Kennedy Kirui, Head of iHub Consultancy
Serah Rono - Developer Advocate, Open Knowledge Institute
Njira Percila - Simulations facilitator, Andela
Judith Owigar - Head of Operations, Akirachix
Conrad Akunga - Co-founder, Innova
Charles Gichuki- Cofounder, Ongair
Hannah Olukoye - Software Engineer, MODE

title: DevCraft 2016 Panel: Diversity in Software Development
